newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Head of EU Albania mission to detail findings.
newsitem.headline: Head of EU Albania mission to detail findings.

text.p: The head of the European mission to Albania will give a press conference in The Hague at 1300 GMT on Thursday on the situation in the troubled Balkan country, the Dutch foreign ministry said.

"Jan de Marchant et d'Ansembourg will inform the press of his findings in Albania," a ministry spokesman said, adding he doubted there would be any formal decisions as the situation is due to be discussed at a Europe Union meeting next week.
The press conference will also be attended by Dutch Foreign Minister Hans van Mierlo, whose country holds the EU presidency in the first half of 1997.
